command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE scheduled_reports;
messages: `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
stdout:
Table	Create Table
scheduled_reports	CREATE TABLE `scheduled_reports` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL,
  `reportType` enum('oee','cpk','oee_cpk_combined','production_summary') NOT NULL,
  `frequency` enum('daily','weekly','monthly') NOT NULL,
  `dayOfWeek` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `dayOfMonth` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `timeOfDay` varchar(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '08:00',
  `recipients` text NOT NULL,
  `machineIds` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `productionLineIds` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `includeCharts` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `includeTrends` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `includeAlerts` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `format` enum('html','excel','pdf') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'html',
  `lastSentAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastSentStatus` enum('success','failed','pending') DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastSentError` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `isActive` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `createdBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin
